title: Multi-Stage Learning for Grasp-Constrained Object Manipulation with a Simulated Panda Robot
abstract: This repository contains code and evaluation videos for our modular reinforcement-learning approach to grasp-constrained object manipulation with a Franka Emika Panda arm in robosuite [1]. The method decomposes the task into six independently trained sub-policies (SAC) and a supervised high-level stage selector. On our benchmark with an occluding obstacle, the system achieves 69.7% success from the default start and 83.8% when starting from randomized intermediate stages, while traditional RL and imitation-only baselines fail. 1. Zhu Y, Wong J, Mandlekar A, Martín-Martín R, Joshi A, Lin K, Maddukuri A, Nasiriany S, Zhu Y. robosuite: A Modular Simulation Framework and Benchmark for Robot Learning. arXiv:2009.12293 [cs.RO]; 2025. Available at: https://arxiv.org/abs/2009.12293.
